title: League Of Legends Story mode
body:
Riot should make a story mode for each character maybe or in as a group. This would be pretty interesting of each Champions lore, 
They should make this a thing.

replies.body: Riot needs to be creative and start something like this, amazing idea
Urg I wish riot would make some sort of interactive storyline (RPG?), but it'd be too difficult I think.
Not difficult! But time and resource consuming.
How would it work though? Would it be 1 HUGE map per champion that's like a regular world with no lanes?

> [{quoted}](name=Zenoaxes,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=nJZ51PXy,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-06-29T10:22:03.949+0000)
>
> How would it work though? Would it be 1 HUGE map per champion that's like a regular world with no lanes?

I reckon it could work quite well if there were certain goals for each champion and for each goal achieved you recieved a short story or something similar. Could also tie in with champion mastery quite well to make it more interactive. Champion Mastery at the moment in my opinion is not very interactive and I have rarely seen someone with a lvl 5 mastery and thought 'wow this person knows how to play this champion'. I think if you added some objectives such as 'Take a turret before 5 minutes' or 'Have less then 10 deaths on your team' for each champion would encourage individuals to actually learn the strengths of each champion and how to play them bfore earning a high level mastery rather than just playing over 30 games on them and achieving level 5 without necessarily any learning cuve involved.
